record.text: wheretosleep.com double-billed me: once by their site and once by the Galdat Suites hotel. It took 10 calls to reach someone - I had to keep calling back. "We are working on this sir, please call back in 24 hours". Again and again. They had no way to call me back or to escalate the call. I had to keep calling their kind but helpless entry-level customer service reps.
